> Nightstrike/ darkfate:
> 
> Nightsrike opened comlink with Cyclonus "Nigh=
trsike and 
> Darkfate to Cyclonus, we're heading towards Atlantis to 
> as=
sist our troops"
=A0
Cyclonus paused for a moment, wondering what had been =
happening in Atlantis. But then again he could perhaps use this development=
 to their advantage. With the loss of the matrix, perhaps victory could be =
salvaged with the destruction of one of the Maximal Bases. 
=A0
=93Understo=
od.=94 Cyclonus said after a moment or two of reflection. =93Acquire all th=
e data in their computer banks, and then detonate the base. There are no su=
rvivors.=94 Cyclonus=92 voice was calm and yet authoritative. 
=A0
(Tag Nig=
htstrike/Darkfate)
=A0
=93Sir.=94 Scourge=92s voice crackled over the commu=
nication link between he and Cyclonus, =93I have not located Rodiums yet, b=
ut he appears to be making his way towards the Maximal base in Atlantis.=94=
 Scourge grunted before he continued, =93Any change in orders?=94 
=A0
Cycl=
onus chuckled very lightly, =93No - only an addition. It would seem that th=
e other minions have journeyed to Atlantis as well. Utilize them as require=
d. They are tasked with mirroring the Maximal database and destroying the c=
ompound. I am sure that would fit in with my orders to you as well?=94
=A0
=
Laughter came over the com channel from Scourge to Cyclonus, =93Yes sir it =
would, it would indeed.=94 
=A0
The laughter became darker and more evil as=
 the channel closed leaving Cyclonus in silence. With a thought he had his =
minions press the attack on the Balack Fortress=85
=A0
(To be continued . .=
 . )
=A0
Preston
(Da=92minion)
